alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN DALE...SOUTHERN HENRY...GENEVA...HOUSTON...NORTHERN JACKSON...EASTERN WALTON...HOLMES AND NORTHERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM CDT... At 1259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Donalsonville to near Graceville to 12 miles northwest of Vernon. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Vernon, Bonifay, Geneva, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Dothan, Headland, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Live Oak, and Malone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
